title: Unspecified Error Occurred (Even after reinstall) 99% then error
body:
Haven't logged in in forever, since the client update actually. Maybe like 4-5 ish months. Idk what to do, I downloaded the Hextech repair tool but nothing I've done on it has worked. Please help, thanks. 

http://imgur.com/a/QwnZ8

replies.body:
Broporo ooooon duty {{summoner:31}} 

Since you're getting to that 99% mark every time, there's a good chance that some antivirus might be blocking that final percent. At that point the patcher will start scanning files again to make sure all is peachy, but sometimes certain antivirus software will block it from scanning again. Try turning those off if possible (*only* while you're updating) and let me know if that gets you in!

Now it just gets to 2% and brings up the "update failed" window up but it'll still continue updating in the background. Tried giving it a chance to get all the way up to 100% but no luck. :/ 

http://imgur.com/a/IaTPZ

Hmmmmm alrighty then let's try a different route. Since it doesn't seem like any antivirus is getting in the way of the download, we may need to double check that your OS has permission to let League do it's thing. 

Sometimes, without those permissions, your OS might think a program is bad and just shuts it down before it can do anything. Let's make sure that you've got all the correct [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), and let me know if that gets you back in.

Well shite. Let's go ahead and get you a little more one on one help. There's a lot more our tech guys can do with you to fix this, so hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get you fixed up as soon as we can!
